original: @286a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @286a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: s'i ta t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: s'i ta t'a r'a s'a dha nam /
translated: Sitātapatrā-sādhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
translated: Sitatārāsādhana

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽ched du zla ba drug gi bar //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma dkar mo la phyag 'tshal lo // ched du zla ba drug gi bar //
translated: Homage to Noble White Tārā.🔽For the sake of [attaining] the supreme [state]

original: sgrol ma'i @286b 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: sgrol ma'i @286b 'khor lo bsgom pa'o //
translated: One should meditate on the Tārā-cakra for six months.

original: dngos grub thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad 'thob 'gyur zhing //
translated: One will attain all powers

original: 'chi ba'i skyon gyis mi gos so //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i skyon gyis mi gos so //
translated: And not be tainted by the faults of death.

original: ngag gi dbang phyug gnang byas pa //
analyzed: ngag gi dbang phyug gnang byas pa //
translated: Granted by the Lord of Speech,

original: 'chi bdag slu ba bsdus pa las //
analyzed: 'chi bdag slu ba bsdus pa las //
translated: From the collected [teachings] on deceiving the Lord of Death,

original: phyung nas sgrol ma dkar mo ni //
analyzed: phyung nas sgrol ma dkar mo ni //
translated: The white Tārā

original: bsgoms na 'jigs pa nyams byed pa //
analyzed: bsgoms na 'jigs pa nyams byed pa //
translated: Is extracted and meditated upon, destroying fear.

original: bzhi pa'i sde tshan dang po aa //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i sde tshan dang po aa //
translated: The first of the fourth group, A,

original: bcas las nam mkhar 'od zer 'phro //
analyzed: bcas las nam mkhar 'od zer 'phro //
translated: Radiates light into space.

original: pad dkar zla ba'i gdan bltas la //
analyzed: pad dkar zla ba'i gdan bltas la //
translated: Looking at the seat of a white lotus and moon,

original: gsum la skyabs 'gro yang brjod la //
analyzed: gsum la skyabs 'gro yang brjod la //
translated: One should also go for refuge to the Three [Jewels].

original: rang bzhin sgro btags gzhom phyir du //
analyzed: rang bzhin sgro btags gzhom phyir du //
translated: In order to conquer the imputed nature,

original: skad cig stong pa nyid du blta //
analyzed: skad cig stong pa nyid du blta //
translated: One should see [everything] as emptiness in an instant.

original: de nas sngon gyi smon lam dbang //
analyzed: de nas sngon gyi smon lam dbang //
translated: Then, by the power of previous aspirations,

original: byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom //
analyzed: byang chub sems kyi yi ge bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the syllable of bodhicitta.

original: padma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: padma dkar po'i dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: In the center of a white lotus,

original: zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du ni //
analyzed: zla ba'i gdan gyi steng du ni //
translated: upon a seat of the moon,

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas ma //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas ma //
translated: she sits in the vajra posture,

original: mchog sbyin pa dang autpa la bsnams //🔽ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od gnas can //
analyzed: mchog sbyin pa dang autpa la bsnams // ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od gnas can //
translated: bestowing boons and holding an utpala.🔽She is the abode of the light of the autumn moon,

original: zla ba la ni rgyab rten cing //
analyzed: zla ba la ni rgyab rten cing //
translated: her back resting on the moon,

original: rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs //
analyzed: rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu rdzogs //
translated: and all her ornaments are complete.

original: bcu drug lo lon lus can ma //🔽sangs rgyas kun dang de sras kyi //
analyzed: bcu drug lo lon lus can ma // sangs rgyas kun dang de sras kyi //
translated: She is sixteen years old,🔽the mother of all the buddhas

original: yum ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma //
analyzed: yum ni 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma //
translated: and their sons, with a desirable form.

original: sgrol ma de yi thugs kar bsgom //
analyzed: sgrol ma de yi thugs kar bsgom //
translated: Meditate on Tara in his heart.

original: 'khor lo dkar po 'od zer can //
analyzed: 'khor lo dkar po 'od zer can //
translated: She is white, has light rays,

original: re'u mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad //
analyzed: re'u mig brgyad la yi ge brgyad //
translated: and the eight syllables are in the eight segments

original: yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o //🔽aom h'a gsal byed dbus gnas pa'i //
analyzed: yongs su bskor bar bya ba'o // aom h'a gsal byed dbus gnas pa'i //
translated: of the wheel, which is completely surrounded.🔽The name of the one to be accomplished

original: bsgrub bya'i ming ni lte bar bya //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ming ni lte bar bya //
translated: is placed in the center of the syllable oṃ.

original: zla drug rtse gcig pa yi yid //
analyzed: zla drug rtse gcig pa yi yid //
translated: With a one-pointed mind for six months,

original: nges par brtan pa rtag tu bya //🔽yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni //
analyzed: nges par brtan pa rtag tu bya // yi ge bcu pa'i sngags 'di ni //
translated: one should always be steadfast.🔽With an undistracted mind,

original: mi skyo'i yid kyis bzlas bya ste //
analyzed: mi skyo'i yid kyis bzlas bya ste //
translated: one should recite this mantra of the ten syllables.

original: aom gyi yi ge dang por sbyin //
analyzed: aom gyi yi ge dang por sbyin //
translated: The syllable oṃ is placed at the beginning.

original: phyis ni t'a re rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: phyis ni t'a re rab tu sbyar //
translated: Later, the syllable tāre is applied.

original: tutt'a re la tu re phyis //
analyzed: tutt'a re la tu re phyis //
translated: After that, the syllable ture is applied.

original: sv'a h'a mtha' ru las kun byed //
analyzed: sv'a h'a mtha' ru las kun byed //
translated: At the end, svaha is added, which accomplishes all activities.🔽Brahma, Indra, Vishnu, the sun and moon,

original: tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang // drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang //
analyzed: tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi zla dang // drag po phyogs skyong 'dod lhas kyang //
translated: Rudra, the directional guardians, and the desire gods

original: ba spu'i rtse mo'ang gcod mi nus //
analyzed: ba spu'i rtse mo'ang gcod mi nus //
translated: cannot even cut a hair on the body.

original: 'chi bdag las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin //
analyzed: 'chi bdag las rgyal sgrol ma bzhin //
translated: Like Tara, one becomes victorious over the Lord of Death.

original: skra dkar gnyer ma skal ngan nad //
analyzed: skra dkar gnyer ma skal ngan nad //
translated: White hair, wrinkles, bad karma, illness,

original: dbul pa la sogs mdor bsdu na //
analyzed: dbul pa la sogs mdor bsdu na //
translated: poverty, and so forth are all eliminated.

original: seng sogs 'jigs pa chen po brgyad //
analyzed: seng sogs 'jigs pa chen po brgyad //
translated: In brief, the eight great fears such as lions

original: sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms byed cing //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rab tu 'joms byed cing //
translated: are completely destroyed.

original: bskul ba med par gos btung ba //
analyzed: bskul ba med par gos btung ba //
translated: Without being requested, clothing, food,

original: khang bzangs rin chen tshogs kyang 'du ;
analyzed: khang bzangs rin chen tshogs kyang 'du ;
translated: and a palace gather like a heap of jewels.

original: / ral gri dang ni mig sman dang // rkang pa bum pa bzang sogs 'grub //
analyzed: / ral gri dang ni mig sman dang // rkang pa bum pa bzang sogs 'grub //
translated: Swords, eye medicine, the excellent vase of feet, and so forth are accomplished.🔽One becomes a poet, a sweet speaker,

original: tshigs bcad mkhan dang ngag snyan dang // blo rno shes rab dri med 'gyur //
analyzed: tshigs bcad mkhan dang ngag snyan dang // blo rno shes rab dri med 'gyur //
translated: and one's intelligence and wisdom become stainless.

original: gzhan yang ci 'dod dngos grub ni //
analyzed: gzhan yang ci 'dod dngos grub ni //
translated: Moreover, whatever siddhis one desires

original: 'khor lo nge las 'byung bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khor lo nge las 'byung bar 'gyur //
translated: will arise from this wheel.

original: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
analyzed: sgrol ma dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of White Tara🔽May all beings be liberated by Tara,

original: nad dang 'jigs pa rnams nyams @287a * //
analyzed: nad dang 'jigs pa rnams nyams @287a * //
translated: Having been freed from all sickness and fear,

original: pa ; / gang zhig phyung nas dge bsags pa //
analyzed: pa ; / gang zhig phyung nas dge bsags pa //
translated: And having accumulated virtue.

original: des ni skye 'gro sgrol mar shog / sgrol ma dkar mo sgrub pa'i thabs //🔽slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i slob ma thu bos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: des ni skye 'gro sgrol mar shog / sgrol ma dkar mo sgrub pa'i thabs // slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa'i slob ma thu bos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of White Tara🔽is finished.🔽It was composed by the disciple of the master Vagisvarakirti.

original: // / pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / lo ts'a ba khams pa dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta don yod rdo rje dang / lo ts'a ba khams pa dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated by the pandita Amoghavajra and the translator-monk of Kham, Bairotsana.
